poems.A-1: A splatter of stars / In the night sky above me / Starry dreams come true
A moonlit river / Reflecting a starlit sky / Twinkling beauty here
My heart's afire / Dancing to the rhythm of life / Joyous and free now
A summer breeze blows / Bringing the sweet scent of flowers / A peaceful bliss here
An ancient forest / A symphony of life buzzing / Nature's harmony
A rainbow of love / Colors of life intertwining / A beautiful view
A butterfly flits / Bringing a message of joy / A moment of bliss
Lightning strikes the sky / Illuminating the night world / Electricity alive
The sun rises high / Its golden light warms my soul / A new day begins
A gentle humming / The sound of the universe / Eternal harmony
